about-summary: My name is Adam HÃ¶llerl and I live in Linz, Austria. I am a passionate software and web developer and am currently studying programming at the HTL Leonding. I have very good school knowledge in the programming languages C#, Java and JavaScript/TypeScript, as well as in the web development languages HTML and CSS. I am also experienced in the Microsoft Office programs Word, Excel and PowerPoint and have already gained some familiarity with SQL and Access databases. Additionally, I have taught myself Sass and Svelte.
